text:
Looking at this historical letter, I can identify the following information:

- The letter appears to be a response regarding a controversy with the Basel Rheinschifffahrt A.G.
- The sender signs at the bottom of the second page
- The letter is addressed to "Herrn Dr. Max Vischer" with an address in Basel
- The date "vom 24.ds." (from the 24th) is mentioned in the first paragraph, though the full date is not clearly visible
